messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Too many negatives
messages.messageBody:
<<I'm not so sure they wouldn't!

WOW those two things are hard to read.

I believe maybe the second person said
You're right, maybe they would have a problem.>>

This was me. What I was trying to say is that the people who said they
WOULD allow certain things meant what they said. Reading it a second time,
I realize that wasn't very clear on my part. I understood her post to say
that people on the list who *said* they would allow certain things wouldn't
*actually* allow those things when it came right down to it. The quote
above..."I'm not so sure they wouldn't"...came from my understanding of what
I read.

Hope that clears things up. It did sound a bit screwy, didn't it? :) It
still probably sounds screwy but I did my best!

Jennifer
